alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Durham; Franklin; Harnett; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:37PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN HARNETT...LEE...WAKE... SOUTHERN DURHAM...EASTERN CHATHAM AND NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EST... At 237 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Sanford to 7 miles east of Southern Pines. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Sanford, Wake Forest, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, Franklinton, and RDU International. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for central North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Chatham; Durham; Franklin; Harnett; Lee; Wake
